keywords.Cleave:
Deals damage to a unit's neighbors.

Cleave deals X damage to the cards directly to the left and right of the unit being attacked. Cleave does not trigger if there is no unit to cleave off, such as the tower being attacked instead.
keywords.Condemn:
Indiscriminately kills a target.

Condemning any card in play instantly destroys it. Condemning an enemy unit awards the appropriate amount of gold that you would have recieved through destroying it through combat or other means. You do not receive gold for condemning your own cards.
keywords.Damage Immunity:
Grants invulnerability to traditional damage.

Units with Damage Immunity cannot be dealt any damage from any source. They can still be killed through other means, such as HP loss.
keywords.Death Shield: Protect to a unit when it goes to die by damage.
keywords.Disarm:
Prevents a unit from attacking.

Disarming a card prevents it from attacking in the next Combat Phase.
keywords.Neighbors: Units directly to the left and right of the target unit.
keywords.Get Initiate: After you play a spell, you get the initiative coin and may immediately take another action. If you use the action to pass, you will retain initiative and may act first in the lane.
keywords.Lock: Locked cards in hand can't be played in X rounds.
keywords.Pulse: A delay between effects of a spell or ability. Continuous effects are updated, reactive abilities are processed, and units that have been condemned or dealt lethal damage are destroyed.
keywords.Rapid Deployment:
Reduces the time spent waiting to be redeployed in the Fountain.

Rapid Deployment allows dead Heroes such as Rix overview Rix to ignore the normal 2 turn wait to reenter play, causing them to be immediately deployable in the next Deployment Phase.
keywords.Regeneration:
Heals and prevents combat damage.

It is essentially negative combat damage. It applies during Combat Damage, potentially negating or even healing past damage. Regeneration can also save heroes from lethal damage.
keywords.Retaliate:
Deals damage to attacking cards.

A card with Retaliate X deals X damage to any unit attacking it.
keywords.Siege:
Damages the tower when blocked.

Siege Damage deals damage directly to the opponent's structure in the lane whenever the unit with Siege damage is blocked.
keywords.Silence:
Prevents ability activation and spell casting.

Silence prevents the afflicted hero from activating any abilities, which includes both hero abilities and item abilities. Additionally, a silenced hero cannot be used to fulfil the color requirement for casting spells (If you silence the only Green Cards. Green hero in a lane, your opponent cannot cast any Green Cards)
keywords.Stun:
Prevents damage, abilities and spell casting.

It is essentially a combination of Disarm and Silence, preventing heroes from attacking (and hence dealing damage in combat), using items or abilities and enabling spell-casting.
keywords.Swap:
Exchanges the position of two units.

Swap exchanges the position of two units immediately, resetting combat targets and recalculating pathing.
keywords.Taunt:
Redirects enemy attacks.

Taunt forces neighbors of a target unit to attack it. It does not affect any cards that cannot normally attack the unit.

cards.text: Move an allied black hero to another lane. Give that hero +4 attack and +7 Siege until end of its next combat phase.

cards.name: The Oath
cards.text: You can not play spells or creeps while this is the active lane. If there is an allied black hero in this lane, allies have +4 Attack.

cards.name: The Omexe Arena
cards.text: Draw a card after a hero dies.

cards.name: The Tyler Estate
cards.text: Both towers have -2 Mana.

cards.name: Thunder God's Wrath
cards.text: Deal 4 piercing damage to each enemy hero in all lanes.

cards.name: Thunderhide Pack
cards.text: Siege 6

cards.name: Thunderstorm
cards.text: Deal 4 damage to each enemy.

skills.name: Ravage
skills.text: Stun Tidehunter's enemy neighbors this round and each other enemy has a 50% chance of being stunned this round.

skills.name: Reactive Armor
skills.text: Timbersaw has +1 Armor for each of its attackers.

cards.name: Time of Triumph
cards.text: Modify allied heroes with +4 Attack, +4 Armor, +4 Health, +4 Cleave, +4 Retaliate, and +4 Siege.

cards.name: Tower Barrage
cards.text: Deal 2 damage to each enemy.

cards.name: Town Portal Scroll
cards.text: Return an allied hero to the Fountain.

cards.name: Track
cards.text: Give a hero +10 Bounty until it dies.

cards.name: Traveler's Cloak
cards.text: Equipped hero has +4 Health.

skills.name: Branches of Iron
skills.text: Treant Protector's allied neighbors have +2 Armor.

cards.name: Trebuchets
cards.text: Deal 2 piercing damage to the enemy tower before the action phase.

cards.name: Tresdin's Standars
cards.text: Modify a red hero with "After you play a red card, give this hero and its called neighbors +1 Attack and +1 Armor this round."

cards.name: Troll Soothsayer
cards.text: Draw an extra card each round.

cards.name: Truth to Power
cards.text: Silence a unit this round.

cards.name: Tyler Estate Censor
cards.text: The enemy tower has -1 Mana.

cards.name: Unearthed Secrets
cards.text: Draw a card after the combat phase if your tower was dealt damage this round.

skills.name: Venomous Nature
skills.text: Deal 4 piercing damage to the enemy tower. May only be used if there are no unblocked enemies.

skills.name: Fury Swipes
skills.text: When Ursa deals battle damage to a unit, modify that unit with -1 Armor.

skills.name: Venomous Nature
skills.text: Summon a Plague Ward into Venomancer's lane each deployment phase.

cards.name: Ventriloquy
cards.text: Choose a unit. It taunts.

cards.name: Verdant Refuge
cards.text: Allies have +1 Armor.

cards.name: Vesture of the Tyrant
cards.text: Equipped hero has +3 Armor and Rapid Deployment. Your tower has +3 Armor.

cards.name: Vhoul Martyr
cards.text: Death Effect: Modify allies with +1 Attack and +1 Health.

cards.name: Viper Strike
cards.text: Give a unit "Deal 2 piercing damage to this unit before the action phase" until it dies.

skills.name: Corrosive Skin
skills.text: When a unit deals battle damage to Viper, modify that unit with -1 Attack.

cards.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
cards.text: Modify a unit with -2 Armor.

cards.name: Watchtower
cards.text: Whenever an enemy improvements enters this lane, draw a card.

cards.name: Whirling Death
cards.text: Choose a allied red hero. Deal 2 damage to its enemy neighbors and give them -2 Attack this round.

cards.name: Whispers of Madness
cards.text: Stun an enemy this round and stun allied heroes in all lanes this round.

cards.name: Wingfall Hammer

skills.name: Wingfall Hammer
skills.text: Give equipped hero and its allied neighbors +X Regeneration this round where X is half its Attack.

skills.text: Move Winter Wyvern to an empty combat position and give it +4 Attack this round.
